attributes.action: End the arbitrary detainment of Julian Assange.
attributes.additional_details: Wiki Leaks has provided the people of this Earth with the information that numerous governments have tried to conceal. Without this interface we would not know half as much about some of heinous actions the ruling bodies of country's have committed.
attributes.background: Julian Assange has been arbitrarily detained for over five years. As the co-founder of Wiki Leaks, Mr Assange has made it his business to release information about the corruptive actions of numerous governments and institutions. He has been deprived his freedom and liberty as a human.
